mapper.update: update gl_loadmap set ldm_title = #{ldmTitle}, ldm_content = #{ldmContent}, ldm_thumbnail = #{ldmThumbnail}, chg_dt = now() where ldm_no = #{ldmNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo}
mapper.delete: delete from gl_loadmap where ldm_no = #{ldmNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo}
mapper.select: select gc.*, glc.ldm_order as order from gl_loadmap_course glc inner join gl_course gc on glc.ldm_no = #{ldmNo} and glc.cos_no = gc.cos_no order by glc.ldm_order asc
